content.text: Hey there! How are you doing?
Doing great! Just finished baking a batch of chocolate chip cookies. I love baking!
That sounds delicious! I love baking too. I'm more of a bread baker though.
Bread baking is awesome too! I love making my own bread. It's so much more satisfying than buying it from the store.
Totally agree! I love the whole process from start to finish. It's really relaxing for me.
I know what you mean! It's so therapeutic. I also love trying new recipes and learning new techniques.
Me too! I'm always on the lookout for new recipes. I'm actually planning on trying my hand at sourdough bread soon.
That's awesome! Sourdough bread is amazing. It's definitely a bit more challenging than other types of bread, but it's so worth it.
I'm sure it will be worth it! I'm excited to try it.
You should post a picture of your sourdough bread on Instagram when you make it! I'd love to see it.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about baking.
Me too! It's so much fun to talk about with people who are passionate about it.
